title: Two opposition MPs join the Government
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Chandana Perera) Two opposition parliamentarians Prabha Ganesan and P. Digambaram have crossed over from the opposition and joined the Government this morning (5th August) at Temple Trees . Prabha Ganesan of Democratic People’s Front and P.Digambaram of the National Union of Workers Front contested the last General…
